definition: office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Hang2 tian1 ju2

definition: NASA, National Aeronautics and Space Administration, agency of US government
pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Hang2 kong1 Hang2 tian1 ju2

sentences.english: China has now become the third space agency to visit this area.
sentences.chinese: 中国现在已经成为第三个访问这个地区的航天局。

sentences.english: It is ahead of Japan and the European Space Agency in terms of space flight.
sentences.chinese: 在太空飞行方面，它赶在日本和欧洲航天局前面。

sentences.english: NASA has found lines of "hydrated" salt minerals on Mars.
sentences.chinese: 美国航空航天局在火星上发现了水合盐矿物的条纹。

sentences.english: An official-looking envelope with NASA's logo in the upper left-hand corner.
sentences.chinese: 一个左上角印着国家航天局标志的官方信封。

sentences.english: In nineteen seventy-four, he retired from NASA and the Navy.
sentences.chinese: 在一九七四年，他退出了美国航天局和海军。

sentences.english: No harm was done, but NASA did not want to take any chances.
sentences.chinese: 没有造成危害，但美国航天局不愿冒险尝试发射。

sentences.english: NASA has been watching the 6-ton satellite closely.
sentences.chinese: 美国航天局一直在密切关注一个重达6吨的卫星。

sentences.english: NASA has called it the worst satellite breakup in history. E-mail to a friend
sentences.chinese: 美国航空航天局把它评价为史上最差的卫星。

sentences.english: Garfield compares this process to his work as computer scientist at NASA.
sentences.chinese: 卡费尔把这个和美国航天局的电脑专家工作作了对比。

sentences.english: NASA regards that as a short-term arrangement, however.
sentences.chinese: 但是，美国航天局将此视为短期安排。

sentences.english: Dr. Jack Farmer is one of NASA's exobiologists.
sentences.chinese: 法默博士是美国国家航空航天局的外空生物学家。

sentences.english: At times, it effectively blinded the satellite, ESA said.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲航天局表示，这些干扰时常使卫星致盲。

sentences.english: So NASA got two non-governmental experts to be resolved.
sentences.chinese: 于是航天局就找来了两个民间专家来解决。

sentences.english: Other NASA officials noted that Congressional support for the new programs was bipartisan.
sentences.chinese: 其他航空航天局官员指出，国会两党分均支持新项目。

sentences.english: According to CNSA's blueprint, it too will bring Moon rocks back to Earth.
sentences.chinese: 据中国航天局的蓝图，它也将把月球岩石带回地球。

sentences.english: The United States of America NASA 2005 termination of this satellite service.
sentences.chinese: 美国航空航天局2005年终止这颗卫星的服役期。

definition: NASA, National Aeronautics and Space Administration, agency of US government
pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Hang2 kong1 Hang2 tian1 ju2

definition: US National Aeronautics and Space Administration/NASA
Jet Propulsion Laboratory, R&D center in Pasadena, California
